metadata.title: CVE-2024-41046 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: ethernet: lantiq_etop: fix double free in detachThe number of the currently released descriptor is never incrementedwhich results in the same skb being released multiple times.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-48.48').
linux-aws package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
linux-azure package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
linux-gcp package in noble is affected and needs fixing.

linux-realtime package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
